extension.summary: Minimal, structured meta-addon with modular providers (a4kscrapers/cocoscrapers), Trakt, Real-Debrid, OpenSubtitles auto-load, and Anime section.
extension.description: Ares is a clean-room meta-addon: Search → Normalize → Rank → Resolve → Play. It adapts to a4kscrapers/cocoscrapers if installed, supports Trakt scrobble/watchlist, Real-Debrid for resolution, OpenSubtitles auto-load, and a customizable menu tree.
